name: 研究方法：語言相關研究
description:
This course aims at introducing different aspects of research theory and practice as well as different types of research methods that are commonly used. It will focus on research methods used in language-related studies, but is not restricted to them. 

Moreover, the research methods introduced in this course will be applicable not only in academic studies but also in workplace when research is needed for further development and improvement. 

More importantly, this course helps students to think clearly when developing their own research topics and to evaluate the arguments made as well as the methods employed by their peers.
goals: 學習一般研究理論以及其實際應用（特別是語言相關研究）。
培養基本學術寫作能力
syllabus:
**研究方法：語言相關研究**

**Research Methods: Language-related Studies**

Fall 2021

Instructor: 蘇席瑤

Office: 誠大樓七樓英語系718研究室

Email: hsysu@ntnu.edu.tw

Office Hours: Mon. 1-3:30p, Wed. 10:30a-12p, or by appointment

**Course Description**

This course aims at introducing different aspects of research theory and practice related to language-related studies and at helping students to develop a research project of their own. As we introduce the basics of research methods, these methods should be applicable in academic studies as well as in students' future workplace when research is needed for further development and improvement. The finished product of this course is a research proposal of your own with some initial result from a pilot study.
